app.name: Name
app.Logout_check: Are you sure you want to log out?

wellcome.help_two: YumYarn allows users to upload high-quality images of their favorite dishes. Posts can include detailed descriptions of the dish, restaurant location, price, and personal impressions. The app encourages creativity and inspiration from images to build a community of food lovers.
wellcome.help_one: YumYarn is a tool for finding and exploring new dining places. Users can view reviews, comments, and ratings from the community, helping them choose restaurants or dishes that suit their personal preferences. This app helps build an interactive community with a passion for exploring and enjoying food.

login.expired: Login session expired, please log in again!
login.register: Your account has been registered! Check your registered email inbox to verify your account.

login.agree: You must agree to our policy to continue!

helping.Introduce1: Political activities, elections, and religious activities are prohibited on the Yumyarn social network.
helping.Introduce2: Prohibited content aimed at committing crimes or encouraging criminal behavior.
helping.Prohibited_Actions1: Posts containing obscene language, discrimination, posts with ethical issues are prohibited.
helping.Prohibited_Actions2: Prohibited posts that cause suffering or have a negative impact on other users.
helping.Inappropriate_content2: Prohibition of publicly disclosing personal information without the consent of the person concerned.
helping.Identity_and_Privacy1: Posts containing misinformation or misleading information are prohibited.
helping.Identity_and_Privacy2: Prohibition of defamatory content against individuals, companies, countries or specific regions.
helping.Slanderous_content1: Impersonating individuals, organizations, or Yumyarn is prohibited.
helping.Slanderous_content2: Prohibition of advertising one's own products, stores, companies, or other commercial content.
helping.Violation_of_law_and_ethics1: Prohibition of acts that infringe on copyrights, trademarks, portrait rights, privacy of users, third parties, or Yumyarn.
helping.Advertising_and_commerce1: Posts introducing one's own products, stores or companies, containing other advertising or commercial content
helping.Spam_and_Malware1: Prohibition of actions that hinder or interfere with the management of the Yumyarn social network.
helping.Intervention_and_management1: Prohibition of other actions that Yumyarn or Ajinomoto Co., Inc. deems inappropriate.

about.Profile: A social networking app where food lovers gather. Share food photos, food locations, search for delicious restaurants, or simply chat about your passion for food, all easily done on this platform.

messenge.seen_d: People can see when you read their messages, but only when both you and they have this feature enabled.
messenge.auto_mes_d: Automatically send messages to those who interact with the posts you promote.
messenge.nofriends: Those who follow each other are considered friends.
messenge.remember: Let's start making friends with someone!
messenge.delete_noti: Notifications will be automatically deleted after 7 days.
